creditline: The Walt McCarthy and Clara Ueland Endowment for Photographs
description:
17 color photos of cameras and camera accessories inside archival divided boxes
a:  five black cameras; two black cases; silver box tied with twill tape
b:  seven black cameras; one silver camera, LLC
c:  boxes of film--Goldeck in URC, Yashica at left center, Mec 16 in LLC; red case with "mec 16" in gold, LRC; blue camera tied with twill tape at right center
d:  seven tiny black and silver cameras; two pocket watches with monograms, ULC; another water below at left edge; four black cases; three brown cases; "Toyoca 16" box, LRC
e:  three black cases; one brown case; clear clase with wood top, ULC; package at top center:  "ILFORD SPECIAL RAPID PANCHROMATIC PLATES"
f:  four brown cases; three black cameras; one silver camera
g:  three black cameras; three silver cameras; one brown camera; red case at center left--"mec 16 SB"; blue box at center right--"Minute 16 / Universal Camera Corporation"
h:  four black cameras; one brown case; three boxes--"Rubina", "Darling" and "Zunow"
i:  three black cameras; two brown cases; red box, left of center--"GEMFLEX"; brown box, LLC; gold box ("Univex MINICAM"), URC; white "Binoca", ULC
j:  one light brown case; two darker brown cases; brown box at center left--"argus CANDID CAMERA"; Ansco black box camera, LRC
k:  two black and silver cameras; two wrapped parcels; tan box tied with twill tape, ULC
l:  Cannon camera in black case at top; camera in blue case at center; black camera with accompanying brown case at bottom
m:  Kodak Instamatic camera bank, ULC; four small brown cases; two black cases, Ansco black box camera, LLC; paper wrapped case tied with twill tape, LLC
n:  black cases and cameras; Ziploc baggies, URC
o:  two small black cases, one with five dark black metal (?) cases; white foam brick at left; cream-colored box tied with twill tape, left of center; green, red and yellow "Petitux" boxes and white and green "Tuxi" box, LLC
p:  handheld flash at top; two brown cases; camera in black case at bottom; two blue boxes, ULQ--"MAMIYA -16" on one box in whi

medium: Archival pigment prints on Hahnemuhle Photo Rag paper
title: 136 Mini Film Cameras in the Smithsonian Institution History of Photography Collection With Old Style Photoshop Filter
